name: USA Flag Pin 9/11 Commemorative Limited Edition 14K Gold plated
description:
Proudly display your patriotism with these Limited Edition 9/11 commemorative US Flag pins.

Originally made for the White House following 9/11, these highly detailed, photo etched, 14K Gold plated, solid metal pins are detailed with red, white and blue enamel color-fill.

Unlike sloppily made imports, you'll note from the photos that these pins are so finely detailed they show all 50 stars and 13 stripes, just like the actual US flag!

The back side includes the etched sentiment September 11, 2001 and a quality military clutch & spur attachment.

We have only a limited quantity (31) of these pins available.  

Price INCLUDES delivery to a single destination within the United states, including Alaska and Hawaii 
* Orders for 1-5 to the same destination by US First Class Mail
* Orders for 6-19 to the same destination include Priority Mail delivery
* Orders for 20+ to the same destination include Express Mail delivery

International delivery additional based upon quantity and destination.

PIZAZZ background: We are a Business, Event and Team Branding company specializing in marketing incentives. Established in 1995 our primary business is with organizations throughout the USA (and beyond). While we are new to Big Cartel and do only a small amount of business over the internet, we are a 5 Star Amazon seller and have a 100% POSITIVE feedback rating on Ebay.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If you are dissatisfied for any reason you may return the item within 7 days of receipt, via prepaid insured delivery for a $3.50 refund (4.99-1.49 S/H). As we are not responsible for damage during shipment, any item returned must be in new, undamaged condition. Refund will be issued promptly following receipt if our inspection verifies like new condition. If we determine the item is NOT in new, undamaged condition, a refund will not be issued and you will be contacted for disposition of your item.

name: 1 1/2" Premium Imported Wired Ribbon - By the Yard
description:
For all our custom gift creations we only use Premium Imported Beautiful Wired Ribbon by the yard. 

We have some surplus inventory and are offering a variety of colors and widths cut to to length "By the Yard" at substantial savings.

This grouping is 1.5" wide and is priced at $0.50 per yard.

We have approximately 70 to 100 yards of each color in stock.

See photos for color # and name.

Please be sure to specify the correct color when completing your order
